info.title: Jira Cloud REST API
info.description: Jira Cloud REST API schema for AgentCore Gateway using direct domain with Basic auth

get.description: Search for issues using JQL (Jira Query Language). This is the primary method for finding issues.

parameters.name: jql
parameters.description: The JQL query string

parameters.name: nextPageToken
parameters.description: Cursor token for paginating through results. Use the nextPageToken from a previous response to get the next page.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return for each issue

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Use expand to include additional information about issues in the response

200.description: Returned if the request is successful
